name: Mandalay Resources Corporation
longDescription: Mandalay Resources is a Canadian-based natural resource Corporation with producing assets in Australia and Sweden, and care and maintenance and development projects in Chile and Canada. The Company focuses on growing its production and reducing costs at its gold-antimony operation in Australia, and its gold mine in Sweden, to generate near-term sustainable positive cash flow.

The Company focuses on growing its production and reducing costs at its gold-antimony operation in Australia, and its gold mine in Sweden, to generate near-term sustainable positive cash flow.
fullAddress: 76 Richmond Street East,Suite 330, Toronto, ON, CA
